feed.title: Workout Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.12.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Show dashboard totals from new functions by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/79
  • Switch per-workout records to use the new functions by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/80
  • Convert user statistics to use the new function by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/81
  • Remove redundant workout statistics from workouts handlers and templates by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/82
  • Add per-user units to the user's profile by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/83

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.11.5...v0.12.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.12.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use preferred units in the workout lap breakdown by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/85
  • Update Human* functions to return values without units by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/86
  • Update statistics in per-workout and past-year to use preferred units by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/87

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.12.0...v0.12.1

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.12.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Distance method to Workout type and update user_profile_calendar.â€¦ by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/88
  • Add API endpoint for single workout statistics (breakdown) by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/89
  • Prevent duplicate MapData entries by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/90
  • Several fixups in one PR by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/91

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.12.1...v0.12.2

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.12.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix download of workouts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/95
  • Switch the timestamp detection in a GPX file by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/96
  • Prepare code for showing different statistic ranges by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/97

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.12.2...v0.12.3

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.13.0
entry.content:
ATTENTION

If you have multiple workouts with the same starting time, they will be pruned as duplicates! You may want to make a backup of your database first!

What's Changed

  • Calculate average of averages for statistics by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/101
  • Ensure the workout-mapdata relation is a 1-1 mapping by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/102
  • Add postgresql support by @icewind1991 in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/92
  • Show the max average speed when showing records by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/104
  • Add swagger docs to document the API by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/105
  • Add support for TCX files by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/99
  • Ensure a user can not have two workouts with the same time by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/103

New Contributors

  • @icewind1991 made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/92

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.12.3...v0.13.0
